metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez Rivero, A
García Triguero, D
Aramburu González, J
Sanz Fernández, R
metadata.dc:description: Granular cell tumors are rare benign neoplasms. Their usual location is in the head and neck, with the larynx being the most frequent ENT site. Three cases of granular cell tumor of the larynx are reported and their characteristics are reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Tumor de células granulares laríngeo.
[Laryngeal granular cell tumor].
